courseDescription:
Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment that is asynchronous and event-driven. Its primary purpose is to facilitate the construction of scalable network applications. We will begin by studying Node.js, including Node Setup and File. In addition, you will be able to appreciate its importance by creating a game project using Node.js. We answer questions like ‘what is a terminal?’ or ‘what is an HTTP file?’. These questions will be addressed and answered before we study the Node Browser.

The course then explores the roles and duties of Node modules. It will teach you how to analyze information in Node URLs and routes. Finally, we will help you investigate the theories about which useful ways you can write files. We will research defining the Lodash module and the use of modules. We also examine the installation and benefits of the NPM.

Finally, the course will teach you how to use Node.js to build a gaming project. We give precise definitions and key foundations so you can confidently use them in your workplace. This course is ideal for getting started with Node.js. So enroll right now and study the essentials of using Node.js.
